Package data_access

Interface DataAccessor

All Known Implementing Classes:
SqlDB
public interface DataAccessor
The DataAccessor interface define methods to be implemented by classes that provide access to the persistent data layer of the application.

  • Method Summary

    • addCustomer

      void addCustomer​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String address, java.lang.String postCode, java.lang.String phone, java.lang.String division)
      Creates a new Customer.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of customer.
      address - Customer's address.
      postCode - Customer's postcode.
      phone - Customer's phone number.
      division - The division (ie state or province) the customer is located in.

    • updateCustomer

      void updateCustomer​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String address, java.lang.String postCode, java.lang.String phone, java.lang.String division, int id)
      Updates an existing Customer.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of customer.
      address - Customer's address.
      postCode - Customer's postcode.
      phone - Customer's phone number.
      division - The division (ie state or province) the customer is located in.
      id - ID number of the customer to be updated.

    • addAppointment

      void addAppointment​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String location, java.lang.String type, java.time.ZonedDateTime start, java.time.ZonedDateTime end, int customerId, int contactId, int userId) throws java.lang.Exception
      Creates a new appointment.
      Parameters:
      title - Title of the appointment.
      description - Description of the appointment.
      location - Location of the appointment.
      type - The type of appointment.
      start - The start time and date of the appointment.
      end - The end time and date of the appointment.
      customerId - Customer ID of the customer associated with this appointment.
      contactId - Contact ID of the contact for this appointment.
      userId - User ID associated with this appointment.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

    • updateAppointment

      void updateAppointment​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String location, java.lang.String type, java.time.ZonedDateTime start, java.time.ZonedDateTime end, int customerId, int contactId, int userId, int appointmentId)
      Updates an existing appointment.
      Parameters:
      title - Title of the appointment.
      description - Description of the appointment.
      location - Location of the appointment.
      type - The type of appointment.
      start - The start time and date of the appointment.
      end - The end time and date of the appointment.
      customerId - Customer ID of the customer associated with this appointment.
      contactId - Contact ID of the contact for this appointment.
      userId - User ID associated with this appointment.
      appointmentId - Appointment ID of the appointment to update.

    • deleteAppointment

      void deleteAppointment​(int id)
      Deletes an appointment.
      Parameters:
      id - appointment ID of the appointment to delete.

    • deleteCustomer

      void deleteCustomer​(int id)
      Deletes a customer.
      Parameters:
      id - customer ID of the customer to delete.

    • deleteCustomerAppointments

      void deleteCustomerAppointments​(int id)
      Deletes all appointments associated with a customer.
      Parameters:
      id - customer ID of the customer to delete appointments for.

    • getUserID

      int getUserID()
      Gets the User ID for the active user.
      Returns:
      User ID for active user.
